verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Endrey ambony loatra,
Tsy tratry ny sainay,
He avo tafahoatra
Ny herinao , ry Ray
Ny lanitra sy tany,
'Zay asan-tananao,
Mitory lavitra any
Ny voninahitrao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tsy takatra mihintsy
'Zay vitanao ry Ray;
Ianao di tsy nitsisty
Mba hamonjena anay.
Fa indro ilay havoana
Mitafy haizim-be,
Mitory fisoloana
Sy famelana re.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ry Tompom-pamonjena,
He menatra izahay
Fa ratsy nefa ekena
Ho zanaky ny Ray.
Atolotray tontolo
Fa tadiavinao
Ny fonay, ry Mpisolo,
Satria navotanao
